tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I would like to share my story and here we goâ€¦

I was 36 years old and weighed 98 kg when I received my diabetes diagnosis in 2014, and that is when my adventure as a diabetic patient began.

Doctor (first doctor) says it's too early for me to get diabetes because of my age. He told me it might be cured if I follow all of his medicines and instructions. I put a lot of efforts (exercise) and at least two years of punctual medication taking into my life. Naturally, medicines are changedâ€”not regularly, but most of the time. After two years, I didn't receive the anticipated outcome. I decided to change doctor, but the situation remained the same, and this is the fourth doctor in eight years.

Sometime around May-2023, I experienced extreme physical pain and my blood sugar unexpectedly spiked above 300. My friend suggested that I see a NEW doctor. Although I was not prepared to see another doctor but I didnâ€™t have a choice.

First visit for 15 mins, NEW doctor asked me to get some reports done (in his lab) and come back after 3 days with all reports. I went to lab, gave the samples that were required (blood, urine, etc.), and was charged more than 6k. I really got angry as I have to pay 6k + consultation fees in the first visit???? but again because of my friend I kept quiet.

Two days after receiving the reports, I went back to the doctor. And this time, it was incredible! He looked over all of my reports and gave me a detailed explanation. The conversation went on for more than 45 minutes.

Additionally, he promised to help me heal in six months as long as I do two things a day.
1. Morning walk (fast) at least 3 â€“ 5 km
2. Regular tablets (1 after breakfast & 1 after dinner) 1000 mg

And this is what I did from day 1
- 1st week fast walk 3 kms
- 2nd week fast walk 5 kms
- 3rd week onwards fast walk 10 kms
Result after 1 month, I lost 3 kg and sugar level below 200

Continue 10 km morning walk (fast) in 2nd month â€“ lost 2 more kg and tablet has come down to 500 mg.

Its 5th month now, I go for walk every day (10 km) and as of today only one tablet of 10 mg after breakfast and thatâ€™s it.

Now a days (last from 1 month) my sugar level is minimum 70 and max 150 and currently my weight is 88 kg.

I am Happy ðŸ˜Š

Thank you Dr. Karunesh (Diabliss Medical Centre, Koramangala, Bengaluru) for all of your help and guidance.

Having consulted him regularly for different issues over the past 9 years, * *** *********** *** **** *** ******** ** ***** *** **** ******* ** ********** He is very friendly, detects and explains the issue in detail, and prescribes very effective medicines.

Thanks sir for being a part of our life and the atmosphere of the clinic is clean with well behaved staff ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹.
reply_text:
Thanks for your appreciation. 
I am extremely happy that I could achieve Diabetes reversal/remission in your Mother's case.
I am happy that her blood sugar are normal without any medication,  she is feeling healthy and comfortable.

review: Dr. Karunesh is a delightfully friendly and jovial individual. He possesses an exceptional ability to attentively listen to patients' concerns with patience and empathy. His treatments are remarkably effective, and what's truly commendable is his commitment to prescribing only necessary medication, avoiding any unnecessary prescriptions. Dr. Karunesh's approach exemplifies genuine care and professionalism, making him a highly recommended healthcare provider.

review: Dr Karunesh Kumar was referred by my uncle at a very crucial time when my mom who was diabetic n asthmatic was tested positive for Covid19. Dr Karunesh with his experience and knowledge and his willingness to serve people during this pandemic took great care n concern in treating my mother, he was just a phone call away in times of need. My mom is hail n healthy now.I am forever indebted to Dr for his support n service. It is very rare to find a doctor who is helpful, patient n knowledgeable, Dr Karunesh is one such person. Even the staff at his clinic are helpful n friendly. I wish them the very best.
reply_text: Thanks.....I am happy and satisfied that your mother recovered well  with home treatment from the low oxygen saturation , without hospitalisation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to see him due to sudden appearance of few nodes in the neck of my wife. We needed second opinion as our previous doctor asked for FNAC immediately after no help from 1 week's course of antibiotics.

Dr. Karunesh's patient approach to understand my wife's problem and concern was extremely calming for her as a patient. Alternative diagnostic tests prescribed helped identify the problem without the need for FNAC. To be able to classify the size and possible reason for the nodes shows his extensive experience.

Thanks a lot Sir.
reply_text: Happy to know that she improved well without the need for FNAC

review: Experience has been good and satisfied with doctor explanation of the issue. He is like family doctor for me

*** ***** ************ ********** **** **** ********  ** **** ** **** ** **** *** **** *** ******** *** ************The doctor changed the medication which was ongoing for a few years but didn't share the prognosis why is the change required. Point to note here is, on asking him the reason he said that they'll be able to tell only after the test results. But without test results they prescribed a number of medicines to be taken for a few months and also referred changes to the ongoing medication 

- Recommended several tests *** ******* ********* ** the test results prescribed a number of drugs- some to be taken for a few months. 

- On asking what each drug is for, the Doctor seemed quite unfriendly. The nurse further directed us to ask the pharmacist what the medication was for

- The receptionist was unhospitable and was resistant to give us the bill

All in all the experience made us rethink the competency of the doctor and the associated staff.

He is a good listner adviser and diagnosis is really good this was my second visit and I recommend him
For everyone

Doctor was very patient. He listened to the issues very carefully and explained in detailed the reason for dizziness. He didnâ€™t directly diagnose the issue but instead took few tests and only then prescribed medications. Very satisfied with the visit. Highly recommend this doctor.

The clinic charged me extra despite making a payment from the app! And when i told it has already been payment the female receptionist did not even check when i told her it's been paid online! Unless you wanna be taken advantage like this don't visit!
reply_text: If  my receptionist asked you to pay , it will not be intentional . she might not have noticed that you have made a cashless , pre paid appointment .  you can give your name , details of bill so that I can make an enquiry regarding the exact  happening on that day .  I regret for the inconvenience faced by you .

review: He listened to me patiently. Gave me enough time to explain my problems. I highly recommend him. The staff is also really good and they are very fast. The whole experience was good. About the treatment, I can explain it better once my condition improves.

I visited the doctor for fever, body ache and weaknessâ€¦.doctor suggested to get multiple tests which were absolutely not required :-( he also told to give her 3 bottle drips ***** ***** **** **** ******* ** ********* ****** ********* All the reports came in as negative and so the doctor says seems like itâ€™s a viral fever. We paid him 7000 INR for a viral :-( absolutely not justified :-(
reply_text:
Lot of people are having Dengue fever or Covid.....  How can you diagnose Dengue fever or viral fever without blood test......I advise intravenous fluids if patient is having high grade fever, dehydration so that hydration is maintained and fast recovery happens........ you got very much benefitted with intravenous fluids and blood test...

Everything looks simple and easy retrospectively........how can you diagnose a Dengue fever without blood test...... Don't forget the benefits you got after knowing that no Dengue fever....
I advise blood test when required only.....
